Article Title: WWE RAW Results & Highlights 10-nov-2025: John Cena becomes Grand Slam Champion, New Tag Team champions, The Last Time is Now tournament begins, and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

John Cena vs. Dominik Mysterio



Damian Priest vs. Rusev

Stephanie Vaquer vs. Raquel Rodriguez

Sheamus vs. Shinsuke Nakamura

Charlotte Flair and Alexa Bliss vs. The Kabuki Warriors



The November 10 episode of Monday Night RAW took place in the TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts. The night kicked off with the hometown hero, John Cena , who made history in his last appearance in Boston. The night then followed with explosive matches in 'The Last Time is Now' tournament and a shocking end to the main event of the show, setting the tone for the upcoming WWE Survivor Series: War Games.Triple H opened this week’s Monday Night RAW and introduced the hometown hero, John Cena, who came out to the ring. Cena addressed the Boston crowd one last time before Dominik Mysterio came out. His arrogance and cocky nature led to Triple H making an impromptu WWE Intercontinental Championship match between Mysterio and Cena. The Never Seen 17 displayed a great performance against Mysterio, who put in an invaluable effort himself. However, in the end, Cena caught Dom as he delivered a Frog Splash and delivered an AA to become the new WWE Intercontinental Champion.This was the first match in ‘The Last Time is Now’ tournament, as it began on RAW this week. Damian Priest’s resilience went up against the fury of Rusev, which ended with The Bulgarian Brute hitting a thumb to Priest’s eye and then a jumping thrust kick to win the match.The match was contested for the WWE Women’s World Championship.A highly back-and-forth title match ended with a combination of Devil’s Kiss and Corkscrew moonsault by Stephanie Vaquer on Raquel Rodriguez to pin her to secure the win and retain her title. However, after the match, Nikki Bella shockingly took down her friend, Vaquer, and held the title high in her hand.This was the second match in ‘The Last Time is Now’ tournament on RAW this week as Sheamus and Shinsuke Nakamura tore down the house with an absolute banger. The match ended with Nakamura missing a spinning wheel kick, leading to Sheamus hitting a Brogue Kick and winning the match.The main event of the night saw Charlotte Flair and Alexa Bliss defend their WWE Women’s Tag Team titles against Asuka and Kairi Sane. Both teams went up against each other following weeks of tensions. However, the ending of a spectacular match saw Nia Jax and Lash Legend interfere, leading to Asuka and Sane hitting a combination move on Flair to seal the pinfall and become the new champions. The other side began attacking Flair and Bliss after the match, leading to IYO Sky and Rhea Ripley coming to their aid. Following a brawl breaking out, Ripley ended the show shouting, ‘War Games.’Also read: 14-time WWE champion sends out hilarious response to a series of wardrobe malfunctions
Article Summary: The november 10 episode of monday night raw took place in the td garden in boston, massachusetts. The night kicked off with the hometown hero, john cena, who made history in his last appearance in boston. It followed with explosive matches in 'the last time is now' tournament and a shocking end to the main event of the show.

Article Title: Megan Thee Stallion receives heartfelt apology from boyfriend Klay Thompson after airport pickup mishap
Article Text:
Megan Thee Stallion and Klay Thompson. Image via: theestallion/Instagram

Klay Thompson apologizes to Megan Thee Stallion after airport mishap





Megan Thee Stallion on her relationship with Klay Thompson





Klay Thompson might be known for his calm demeanor on the court, but off it, the Dallas Mavericks star recently showed his softer side. After arriving late to pick up his girlfriend, rapper Megan Thee Stallion , from the airport, Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and his remorse. The clip, shared by Megan on social media, captured the NBA star trying to make amends with flowers in hand and genuine regret on his face.The moment quickly became a talking point among fans, who couldn’t get enough of the couple’s chemistry and Thompson’s down-to-earth approach. It also comes at a time when both are thriving in their respective careers, with Thompson beginning his new season in Dallas and Megan releasing new music inspired by their relationship.In the video posted online, Klay Thompson can be seen handing Megan a bouquet while apologizing repeatedly for showing up late. “Roses for my boo,” he said while driving her home. “I’m sorry I was late, babe. Damn it. I’m sorry. I thought I timed it well. Ah, just sorry. There’s no excuse.”Fans immediately flooded social media with amused and affectionate reactions, praising Thompson’s gesture as “adorably human.” The incident added another viral moment to their growing list of public appearances since confirming their romance earlier this year.Over the summer, the couple enjoyed a fishing trip that gave fans a glimpse into their playful dynamic. “So today, Klay is taking me on another adventure and we’re going fishing,” Megan said at the time. Thompson responded lovingly: “I got my queen on board, of course I feel cool. I’m the coolest guy in this harbor!”For Megan, whose real name is Megan Jovon Ruth Pete, the relationship marks a new chapter. “This is my first relationship where I’ve ever been with somebody who’s genuinely a nice person, and he makes me genuinely happy,” she told Page Six.“I just never dated somebody like him before and I’m just grateful that he’s here by my side and he feels the same way about me.”Despite occasional public skepticism — even from personalities like Shaquille O’Neal, who jokingly doubted their relationship on The Big Podcast — fans have embraced the pair’s authenticity. O’Neal later called Megan “athletic, so beautiful, and so gorgeous,” insisting his remarks were lighthearted.For now, Thompson and Megan seem unfazed by outside opinions. Their recent viral moment only serves to extend a genuine connection between two stars from different worlds. The duo has been very active on social media to share their personal moments of joy and love. Megan has over 32.7 million followers on Instagram, while Thomson has 16.8 million fans on the platform.Stallion is fully embracing her lover girl era — and fans are loving it. The three-time Grammy winner took to Instagram to tease a behind-the-scenes look at her new single “Lover Girl,” a song she openly admits is inspired by her boyfriend, NBA star Klay Thompson.“This is my song about Klay,” Megan said in the clip with a shy smile. “First n**** in life that has ever gotten a song outta me.” Fans quickly flooded the comments, cheering for the rapper’s happiness and her growing romance with the four-time NBA champion.Listeners have already picked up on the deeper meaning behind “Lover Girl.” In the track, Megan raps about finding someone who truly matches her energy and confidence. “Ayy, your n**** fantasy, my man reality,” she spits, celebrating a relationship built on mutual respect and balance.The lyrics hint at a future together too, with lines about “making big moves” which is a nod to the couple’s rumored move-in together.Also Read: NBA’s highly anticipated Europe-based league’s potential release date revealed
Article Summary: Klay thompson arrived late to pick up his girlfriend, rapper megan thee stallion, from the airport. The dallas mavericks star went viral for his heartfelt apology and his remorse. The clip, shared by megan on social media, captured the nba star trying to make amends.

Article Title: Is Stephen Curry playing tonight Vs Oklahoma City Thunder? Golden State Warriors legend's status and health condition revealed (11-11-2025)
Article Text:
Stephen Curry is playing tonight (Image via NBA)

Stephen Curry’s uncertain return keeps the Golden State Warriors fans on edge ahead of Oklahoma City Thunder clash

The Golden State Warriors fans are kind of anxious for tonight's match with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Their main player, Stephen Curry, who was suffering from an illness, was still listed as a probable player in the last game and thus was a concern for the fans.Having just returned from his injury, Curry missed his third consecutive game and the Warriors’ game against the Indiana Pacers due to illness. This happened due to Curry's lingering cold, after returning from an injury. His return may prove to be one of those defining moments at the beginning of the 2025–26 NBA season, as the team currently sits at an even record of 5–5.The Golden State Warriors have been struggling a lot during the time Curry was not there. They have lost their character, the offense has dropped to the lowest point, and even the defense has not been so dependable. A healthy Curry in the lineup could be the one thing this team needs. The coach Steve Kerr was also anxious due to Curry's health.However, thankfully, Steph Curry does not have a serious injury. The 37-year-old's "lingering cold" which has ruled him out for three consecutive games does not appear to be gone yet as winter is fast approaching in the US.He is therefore returning for the Oklahoma City Thunders game on November 12.Nevertheless, he had to miss back-to-back games against the Sacramento Kings and Denver Nuggets due to an unexpected illness. According to reports, his health got worse before those games, thus the Warriors' medical staff decided to put his complete recovery ahead of a hasty return.On November 10, the Golden State Warriors made the official announcement of Curry's injury. During Curry's absence, Draymond Green and Brandin Podziemski were the leading players of the Warriors' offense. Despite the fact that the star player of the Warriors has already missed a great deal of time this season, the announcement was still a huge disappointment for both the management and fans alike.Hence, the Warriors had tagged him as questionable heading into the previous match. However, when news broke a couple hours ahead of the game that Curry would miss the match against the Pacers, dreams were shattered.So far, the Golden State Warriors have had Stephen Curry on the court in 8 games during the 2025-26 NBA season, where he has been getting 31.1 minutes on average. However, he has scored a total of 26.8 points per game for the Warriors during this period of time. Tuesday night's game against the Oklahoma City Thunder will be Curry's next opportunity to play.Also read: Stephen Curry receives a blunt message as Golden State Warriors’ momentum suddenly unravels
Article Summary: Golden state warriors star stephen curry has been ruled out for three consecutive games due to an illness. The 37-year-old is expected to return against the oklahoma city thunder on november 12. His return may prove to be one of those defining moments at the beginning of the 2025–26 nba season.

Article Title: Drama brews as Bill Belichick’s daughter-in-law seemingly snubs Jordon Hudson during UNC’s big win
Article Text:
Cold vibes in Chapel Hill: Bill Belichick’s family tension spills into the spotlight (Getty Images and Backgrid)

Jordon Hudson’s “banned” necklace fuels Belichick family tension





More NFL coverage

Things are looking frosty in the Belichick family these days. During North Carolina’s tight 20–15 win over Stanford on Saturday, head coach Bill Belichick’s girlfriend, Jordon Hudson, and his daughter-in-law, Jennifer Schmitt, appeared to keep their distance. The two women attended the game at Chapel Hill but reportedly avoided each other entirely — a scene that didn’t go unnoticed by fans and cameras alike. While Belichick focused on leading his Tar Heels, the off-field drama between Hudson and Schmitt quietly took center stage.Jordon, 24, was seen standing with folded arms in a white tank top and a blue reptile miniskirt, while Jennifer matched the team colors in a white crop top and blue shorts. The chilly atmosphere between them follows their very public online feud earlier this year.The tension dates back months when Jennifer, who’s married to Bill Belichick’s son Stephen, took a jab at Hudson’s behavior during Bill’s interview with CBS' Tony Dokoupil. Jennifer wrote, “Publicists act in a professional manner, and don’t 'storm' off set delaying an interview” — a pointed comment aimed squarely at Jordon.The young model had stepped in during that interview, prompting Bill to later defend her, saying she only intervened after he repeatedly told CBS Mornings producers he wanted to discuss his book, “The Art Of Winning: Lessons from My Life in Football. ”Since then, Jordon Hudson’s presence around UNC football has sparked constant headlines. Despite the Tar Heels’ 4–5 record, her game-day appearances continue to draw more attention than the team’s performance. At Saturday’s game, it was her outfit — especially a necklace featuring one word that seemed to reference her rumored “ban” from UNC facilities — that caught fans’ eyes.Back in May, rumors swirled that Hudson had been banned from team grounds, though the school denied them. Still, her choice of jewelry seemed like a subtle, perhaps petty, response to those claims. Standing on the sideline in stylish white boots, Hudson appeared unbothered and intent on making her presence felt.For now, the Tar Heels are finding their rhythm with two straight wins and another test coming against Wake Forest. But even as Bill Belichick brings his winning touch to Chapel Hill, it’s clear that the family drama off the field isn’t cooling down anytime soon.
Article Summary: Bill belichick’s girlfriend, jordon hudson, and his daughter-in-law, jennifer schmitt, appeared to keep their distance. The two women attended the game at chapel hill but reportedly avoided each other entirely. The chilly atmosphere between them follows their very public online feud earlier this year.

Article Title: Heartfelt tributes pour in after Marshawn Kneeland’s death: Family, friends, and teammates remember beloved Cowboys star
Article Text:
Family and teammates honor Marshawn Kneeland’s memory with heartfelt tributes (Image via: Getty Images)

Remembering Marshawn Kneeland: Family and friends honor his life beyond the game

Tributes to Marshawn Kneeland continue from Dallas Stars, NFL and other sports figures

More coverage in NFL:

The NFL world is mourning the heartbreaking loss of Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland, who passed away at just 24. A rising star known for his relentless energy and bright smile, Kneeland’s sudden death has left a deep void across the football community. Beyond his growing success on the field, he was loved for his humility, warmth, and the quiet strength that defined him as both a player and a person.His passing came just days after a standout performance against the Arizona Cardinals, where he scored his first NFL touchdown on a blocked punt recovery. The moment captured his talent and determination, yet behind that triumph was a young man silently struggling. His tragic death has reignited an urgent conversation across professional sports about mental health and the emotional toll of life in the spotlight.Those closest to Kneeland describe him as more than just a football player, he was a gentle soul who carried warmth and humility into every room. His grandmother affectionately called him her “baby giant,” a nickname that beautifully captured the contrast between his imposing size and his tender heart.His cousin, Nicole Kneeland-Woods, shared an emotional reflection on the kind of person he was. “He was physically a big guy, but he was the most kindhearted, caring, just generous, loving person that you'd ever meet,” she told ESPN.“We always knew he was going to be something because he was different, focused. He knew what he wanted.”Kneeland faced unimaginable personal loss before reaching his dream, losing both his grandfather and his mother within a short span. Yet those who knew him say he carried himself with quiet strength, using their memories as motivation rather than despair. His family believes that resilience defined him as much as his athletic talent.Kneeland’s agent, Jon Perzley, was among the last people to speak to him. Perzley told ESPN that Kneeland had been in good spirits during their final conversation, focused on improving and continuing to grow as a player. He declined to share further details of their last exchange because of the ongoing investigation but confirmed that Kneeland told him he loved him.“He just had this charm about him that was so pure and honest. I don't think there's a person who crossed paths with him who had a bad thing to say,” Perzley said. “On the outside you go, he checks every box that exists, and so I think that's why it's really hard for people right now. It's hard to understand it. Really hard.”From Dallas to Western Michigan, Kneeland’s teammates shared stories that reflect his lasting impact. Andre Carter, who played alongside him in college, called Kneeland’s energy “infectious.” He said, It's an understatement to say how great his energy [was] and just how much he was needed in that room.”Western Michigan defensive lineman Hozey Haji-Badri, one of Kneeland’s closest friends, said he leaned on him for support after transferring from East Carolina. Kneeland picked him up before practice and took him out to eat afterward, helping him settle into the team. “He really got me acclimated,” Haji-Badri said. “And for that, I’ll never forget.” The two bonded over their shared love of food, from barbecue to Thai, and built a friendship that went far beyond football.Kneeland’s passing is a devastating reminder that success on the field doesn’t always reflect what’s happening inside. His life and untimely death have become a powerful call for empathy and mental health awareness across professional sports. The Dallas Cowboys organization, his teammates, and fans across the country continue to honor his memory, not just as a talented player, but as a compassionate young man who left an indelible mark on everyone who knew him. Marshawn Kneeland’s legacy will live on as a reminder of resilience, kindness, and the importance of reaching out before it’s too late.
Article Summary: Dallas cowboys defensive end marshawn kneeland died at just 24. He was known for his relentless energy and bright smile. His death has reignited an urgent conversation about mental health and the emotional toll of life in the spotlight. His passing is a devastating reminder that success on the field doesn't always reflect what’s happening inside.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark’s golf round takes hilarious twist as Sophie Cunningham vows to heckle with beer in hand
Article Text:
Sophie Cunningham and Caitlin Clark. Image via: Scott Eklund/NBAE via Getty Images

Sophie Cunningham turns Caitlin Clark’s caddie role into a comedy act



Sophie Cunningham on caddying for Caitlin Clark, country music cameos & West Wilson on Bravo Con!

Caitlin Clark brings Fever energy to the fairway



Fans expecting to see Caitlin Clark light up the court will instead find her on the golf course this week, but with an unexpected twist. The Indiana Fever superstar is set to participate in The Annika LPGA Pro-Am in Florida on November 12, marking her second consecutive appearance at the celebrity event. Yet what has everyone talking is her choice of caddie, teammate Sophie Cunningham, who plans to bring more laughter than golf expertise.Cunningham, known for her competitive edge and bold humor, made it clear that she is taking her new role lightly. She once misspelled the golfer’s warning “Fore!” as “Four!” on Instagram, a mistake that Caitlin Clark herself corrected. That small mix-up told fans everything they needed to know about Cunningham’s golf background. Even so, her energy and humor guarantee that this pairing will be one of the most entertaining of the tournament.During a recent episode of her Show Me Something podcast, Sophie Cunningham revealed her unconventional approach to caddying. “Hopefully they’re not too serious, because I’ll get kicked out of the group,” she said with a laugh.When co-host West Wilson reminded her that her job as a caddie is to keep the mood light, she replied, “Yeah, and I also found out that I don’t have to carry any [golf] bags.So I’m gonna be carrying a lot of beers.”When Wilson joked about rowdy spectators at the event, Cunningham quickly fired back, “Well, there will be a drunk female yelling back at them. Me.” That remark summed up her entire attitude toward the day ahead. She may not know every golf term, but she is determined to bring entertainment and good vibes.Clark will be joined by teammates Lexie Hull and Sophie Cunningham, both serving as celebrity caddies during the event. According to NBC Sports, the Golf Channel will provide live coverage of Clark’s round, which means fans can expect plenty of memorable moments between the trio.While Clark focuses on her swing and competitive edge, Cunningham’s carefree spirit will keep things light on the course. If Sophie Cunningham keeps her word, spectators may witness the most amusing caddie performance in LPGA Pro-Am history.Also Read: Is Jalen Green alright? Suns guard gets heartbreaking injury update, sidelined for weeks
Article Summary: Caitlin clark is set to participate in the annika lpga pro-am in florida on november 12. She will be joined by teammates lexie hull and sophie cunningham, both serving as celebrity caddies. Cunningham once misspelled the golfer’s warning “fore!’ as “four!” on instagram.

Article Title: Jerry Jones gets emotional sharing how Cowboys will honor Marshawn Kneeland after shocking death at 24: "Everybody evaluates everybody"
Article Text:
Jerry Jones reveals how the Dallas Cowboys will honor Marshawn Kneeland after his tragic death (Getty Images)

Jerry Jones honors Marshawn Kneeland’s life and legacy



More NFL coverage

The Dallas Cowboys are finding ways to cope with the devastating loss of defensive end Marshawn Kneeland, who died on November 6 at the age of 24. Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones broke his silence about the tragedy during an interview with Dallas-Fort Worth’s 105.3 The Fan, revealing emotional plans to honor Kneeland’s memory.The news has shaken the entire Cowboys community, leaving teammates and fans struggling to comprehend the loss of a young player who was only beginning his NFL journey.Jerry Jones confirmed that Cowboys players will wear a special decal on their helmets for the rest of the NFL season in memory of Kneeland. The design is still being finalized, but the gesture reflects how deeply the team wants to keep his spirit close. During Monday Night Football against the Las Vegas Raiders on November 17, players will also wear t-shirts honoring Kneeland during warm-ups. The tribute will continue when the Cowboys return home to AT&T Stadium to face the Philadelphia Eagles on November 23-- their first home game since Kneeland’s death, which Jones said left them “devastated. ”“Just hard to believe the content that was on the other phone in the middle of the night when we all got the news,” Jones told 105.3 The Fan, his voice heavy with emotion.Authorities found Kneeland’s body in Frisco with an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound, just hours after a police chase. According to dispatch audio obtained by PEOPLE, his family had received “a group text from him saying goodbye” shortly before his death.Jones spoke about the intense pressures NFL players face, both on and off the field. “Everybody evaluates everybody, it's the nature of it. You're under an evaluation almost from the time you get up until you go to bed,” he said, reflecting on the mental strain that often remains unseen. “No one gets more attention, no one gets any more scrutiny, no one gets any more critiquing than these guys that play this game... He lived that life every day. ”Remembering Kneeland, Jones added, “He was very unique in his zest for life… He was very unique in his passion for the game.” His words carried a deep sense of loss for a player who, as Jones said, “was just getting started.”The Cowboys held a team meeting led by head coach Brian Schottenheimer and psychologist Heather Twedell to help players process the tragedy. The team also leaned on The Defensive Line Foundation, an organization that supports individuals and families facing mental health crises.Through every tribute and conversation, one thing is clear -- Marshawn Kneeland’s spirit will remain a part of the Cowboys family forever.
Article Summary: Jerry jones reveals how the dallas cowboys will honor marshawn kneeland after his tragic death. Cowboys players will wear a special decal on their helmets for the rest of the nfl season. The team also leaned on the defensive line foundation, an organization that supports individuals and families facing mental health crises.

Article Title: Bahrain makes history: Meet Captain Fatima Nabeel, the first Bahraini woman to pilot world's largest commercial jet
Article Text:
Bahraini A380 trailblazer, Captain Fatima soars into history/Image: Gulf Daily News (GDN Online)

Bahraini woman reaches Captain status

Who is Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood?

Why does the A380 matter?

Bahraini women in aviation

Inspiration for the next generation





For the Kingdom of Bahrain, the year marks a soaring new chapter in its history books. Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood has landed an unprecedented achievement, becoming the nation's first female Captain to command the majestic Airbus A380. Taking the controls of the world's largest passenger aircraft, Captain Al Qaood has not only validated her own mastery of complex flight technology but has also symbolically lifted her entire country onto a global stage, demonstrating Bahrain's commitment to nurturing pioneering female leadership in one of the most demanding professions on Earth.The skies have a new commander, and she hails from the Kingdom of Bahrain. Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood has officially achieved the ultimate dream of commercial pilots: the prestigious rank of Captain. What makes this an extraordinary milestone is the aircraft she commands—the colossal Airbus A380. Captain Al Qaood is the first woman from Bahrain to reach this elite status while piloting the world’s largest commercial passenger jet.This achievement follows a rigorous and demanding journey.Reaching Captain status requires accumulating thousands of flight hours, passing complex technical examinations, and demonstrating flawless command ability—skills proven by Captain Al Qaood on one of the most sophisticated machines ever built.Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood's historic ascent to the command seat of the Airbus A380 is a defining moment for Bahrain and the Arab world, marking a major triumph for women in professional aviation. As a proud Bahraini national, her achievement is uniquely significant because she is the first woman from the Kingdom to achieve the rank of Captain while piloting the colossal A380, the world's largest commercial aircraft. While other pioneering women, such as Captain Yasmeen Fraidoon, previously broke the barrier by becoming Bahrain's first female Captains on smaller fleet aircraft, Captain Al Qaood has taken that legacy to the ultimate level of complexity and scale.Her success is the culmination of years of rigorous, demanding technical training and thousands of hours in the sky, positioning her not merely as a skilled pilot, but as a global symbol of the ambitious, highly-trained female workforce that is shattering traditional ceilings throughout the modern Gulf region.To truly grasp the scale of Captain Al Qaood’s achievement, one must understand the significance of the Airbus A380, often nicknamed the "Superjumbo." It represents the pinnacle of commercial aviation engineering, and commanding it is a globally recognized feat of skill.The A380 is a double-decker giant that demands exceptional expertise:Unmatched Scale: It is the largest passenger plane in operation, weighing nearly 600 tonnes at takeoff and carrying over 500 passengers.Technical Mastery: Its complex systems require a Captain who possesses not only piloting skills but also superior crew resource management and emergency procedure expertise.The Elite Few: The number of pilots, particularly women, qualified to command this massive aircraft is incredibly small, placing Captain Al Qaood in an elite global cohort of aviators.Her position is a powerful testament to her technical precision and ability to lead a crew responsible for hundreds of lives.Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood’s achievement is the latest in a line of groundbreaking firsts for Bahraini women in the air, showing a consistent national commitment to female empowerment in the aviation sector.First Captains: Captain Al Qaood follows in the footsteps of pioneers like Captain Yasmeen Fraidoon, who became Gulf Air's first female Bahraini Captain on the national carrier's fleet (Airbus A320s/A330s). Captain Al Qaood's achievement extends this legacy to the A380.Military Milestones: In 2018, Sheikha Aisha bint Rashid Al Khalifa made history as the Kingdom's first female fighter pilot, flying a BAE Hawk.Engineering Excellence: Pioneering women like Hend Al Awadhi were the first female aircraft engineers, ensuring the safety of the fleet from the ground up.Captain Al Qaood’s command of the A380 is a symbol that the glass ceiling for women in the Gulf is not just cracked—it’s been completely shattered at the cruising altitude of 43,000 feet.Captain Al Qaood’s success is a direct, visible call to action for young women across the Middle East. Her journey is proof that dedication, passion, and rigorous training open doors to the most challenging and rewarding careers, regardless of background.By taking the ultimate seat on the ultimate jet, she has provided a powerful narrative: the complex technical fields of science and aviation are fully accessible. Her legacy, flying the world’s largest commercial aircraft, serves as a beacon of possibility, ensuring that the future of aviation is increasingly diverse and female-led.
Article Summary: Captain fatima nabeel al qaood is the first woman from bahrain to reach this elite status while piloting the world’s largest commercial passenger jet. She follows in the footsteps of pioneers like captain yasmeen fraidoon, who became gulf air's first female captain on the national carrier's fleet.

Article Title: Pat Murphy creates history with rare back-to-back NL Manager of the Year wins joining the iconic list of baseball legends
Article Text:
Pat Murphy (Image via: IG/X)

Pat Murphy’s back-to-back win writes a new chapter in baseball's long history of managerial greatness

Milwaukee Brewers manager Pat Murphy has created history by winning the 2025 National League Manager of the Year, becoming the first to claim the honor in consecutive seasons since Bobby Cox’s Atlanta Braves era in 2004 and 2005. The 66-year-old skipper’s latest triumph not only marks a personal milestone but also highlights the Brewers’ transformation into one of the most consistent and disciplined teams in the league. Murphy’s achievement is both rare and defining, placing him in the same breath as the legendary managers who shaped baseball’s modern era.Murphy’s journey with Milwaukee has been defined by belief and balance. After taking over from Craig Counsell, many predicted a rebuilding phase for the Brewers. Instead, Murphy turned skepticism into success, crafting a team built on adaptability, sharp game instincts, and strong clubhouse chemistry. His leadership style blends modern analytical precision with the emotional intelligence of an old-school baseball mind. “He’s not just managing games, he’s managing people,” one player said earlier this season, capturing the essence of Murphy’s impact. His consecutive Manager of the Year honors affirm that leadership in today’s game goes beyond tactics — it’s about creating trust and resilience that lasts through every inning.Pat Murphy now stands alongside some of baseball’s most respected figures, joining a legacy built by names like Bobby Cox, Dusty Baker Jr., Tony La Russa, Joe Maddon, and Buck Showalter. His back-to-back success places him among the few who have managed to sustain excellence across multiple seasons. Since the award’s inception, these names have represented the standard of strategic brilliance and team leadership that defined their eras.A look at the legendary names who've shaped the National League Manager of the Year legacy:2024 – Pat Murphy (Milwaukee)2023 – Skip Schumaker (Miami)2022 – Buck Showalter (NY Mets)2021 – Gabe Kapler (San Francisco)2020 – Don Mattingly (Miami)2019 – Mike Shildt (St. Louis)2018 – Brian Snitker (Atlanta)2017 – Torey Lovullo (Arizona)2016 – Dave Roberts (LA Dodgers)2015 – Joe Maddon (Chi Cubs)2014 – Matt Williams (Washington)2013 – Clint Hurdle (Pittsburgh)2012 – Davey Johnson (Washington)2011 – Kirk Gibson (Arizona)2010 – Bud Black (San Diego)2009 – Jim Tracy (Colorado)2008 – Lou Piniella (Chi Cubs)2007 – Bob Melvin (Arizona)2006 – Joe Girardi (Florida)2005 & 2004 – Bobby Cox (Atlanta)Under Murphy, the Brewers have built their success around strategy, depth, and connection. Without relying on star-heavy rosters, Milwaukee’s consistency has come from its culture of adaptability — a reflection of its manager’s steady influence. His approach to managing pressure, trusting younger players, and fine-tuning rotations has kept the team competitive even against higher payrolls.Murphy’s 2025 victory is more than a personal achievement. It’s a symbol of a manager redefining what success looks like in today’s National League — one built on balance, communication, and faith in the collective. As Milwaukee continues its rise, Pat Murphy’s back-to-back titles aren’t just part of the record books. They are the start of a new chapter in baseball leadership, one that future managers will look up to as the blueprint for sustained excellence.Also read: Fans can’t stop talking about Shohei Ohtani’s heartfelt Dodger Stadium moment with his dog
Article Summary: Milwaukee brewers manager pat murphy has won the national league manager of the year award for the second year in a row. Murphy is the first to claim the honor in consecutive seasons since bobby cox’s atlanta braves era in 2004 and 2005. Murphy joins a legacy built by names like bobby cox, dusty baker jr. tony la russa, joe maddon, and buck showalter.

Article Title: Is Chet Holmgren playing tonight vs Golden State Warriors? Latest update on the Oklahoma City Thunder star’s injury report (November 11, 2025)
Article Text:
Oklahoma City Thunder center Chet Holmgren (7) drives to the basket as Memphis Grizzlies forward Kentavious Caldwell-Pope (3) defends (Image via Imagn)

Oklahoma City Thunder

Chet Holmgren has officially been cleared to play

Chet Holmgren Injury Status vs Golden State Warriors (November 11, 2025)

Chet Holmgren’s Role in Tonight’s Game vs Warriors

Oklahoma City Thunder’s Injury Impact and Team Depth

Holmgren’s Resilient Journey

Thewill have a major boost tonight asagainst the Golden State Warriors on November 11, 2025. The 7-foot-1 forward-center’s return could prove decisive as the Thunder host the defending champions at the Paycom Center in a highly anticipated Western Conference showdown.Oklahoma City enters the contest with an impressive 10-1 record and will look to extend its winning streak behind Holmgren’s presence on both ends of the court. Despite battling through injuries this season, Holmgren’s resilience continues to define his second year in the league, offering the Thunder both defensive stability and offensive versatility heading into one of their toughest matchups yet.Chet Holmgren had been managing a low back strain that sidelined him for multiple games earlier this season. The team approached his recovery cautiously, ensuring he didn’t rush back before achieving full fitness. Recent updates confirm that the Thunder star has made significant progress and has been medically cleared to return to full game action. In fact, Holmgren recently appeared in back-to-back games for the first time since October 27, a major milestone in his rehabilitation.His latest performance came against the Memphis Grizzlies, where he impressed with 21 points and seven rebounds despite still recovering from his injury.The game showcased his growing confidence and hinted at a return to full consistency. Coaches and analysts have praised his determination to play through discomfort, highlighting his commitment to helping the Thunder sustain their elite level of play.Holmgren is expected to play a critical role in tonight’s game, particularly on the glass. The Warriors have struggled with rebounding this season due to their smaller lineup, which gives Holmgren a favorable matchup advantage. Betting experts have projected him to exceed 7.5 rebounds, considering his previous dominant showings against Golden State. His ability to stretch the floor and alter shots defensively could be a deciding factor as OKC looks to contain the Warriors’ high-tempo offense led by Stephen Curry.While Holmgren’s recovery is a major relief, the Thunder are still shorthanded. Key players like Lu Dort, Aaron Wiggins, and Jalen Williams remain unavailable, leaving Holmgren to shoulder additional responsibilities on both ends. His length, rim protection, and shooting touch make him indispensable, especially as Oklahoma City navigates through a challenging stretch of games without several core contributors.Chet Holmgren’s rise has been nothing short of inspiring. After losing his entire rookie season to a devastating Lisfranc foot injury, he has emerged as a cornerstone of the Thunder’s title aspirations. Fans have rallied behind his comeback story, admiring his perseverance and unique blend of size, agility, and skill. Facing a star-studded Warriors squad tonight only adds more anticipation, as supporters eagerly await another strong performance from the young standout.Also read: Golden State Warriors vs Oklahoma City Thunder regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, and more (November 11, 2025) In summary, Chet Holmgren is officially active and ready to play tonight against the Golden State Warriors. With his back injury behind him, the Thunder will rely on his energy and versatility to maintain their dominant start to the season in what promises to be an intense Western Conference clash.
Article Summary: Oklahoma city thunder center chet holmgren has been cleared to play against the golden state warriors on november 11, 2025. The 7-foot-1 forward-center's return could prove decisive as the thunder host the defending champions at the paycom center. Oklahoma city enters the contest with an impressive 10-1 record and will look to extend its winning streak.

Article Title: Travis Hunter Injury Timeline: Inside the recovery plan and when Jaguars fans can expect his long-awaited return
Article Text:
Jaguars rookie Travis Hunter ruled out for season (Getty Images)

When can Jaguars expect Travis Hunter to return from his knee injury?



More NFL coverage

The Jacksonville Jaguars have taken a major hit as rookie sensation Travis Hunter is officially ruled out for the rest of the 2025 season. The team’s second-overall pick, who had been electrifying both sides of the ball, suffered a knee injury during practice in late October, dealing a crushing blow to Jacksonville’s playoff hopes. Initially placed on injured reserve with hopes of a late-season return, the situation took a sharp turn this week when it was confirmed that Hunter had undergone season-ending surgery.On Tuesday, NFL insider Adam Schefter shared the grim update on X, writing, “Travis Hunter underwent surgery today to repair his LCL which will sideline him for the remainder of the season. There was no additional damage beyond his LCL. The procedure was done by Dr. Cooper and Dr. Kaplan in Dallas. He’s expected to return to full football activities within six months.” That timeline gives fans hope that their dual-threat rookie will be back to full strength by the offseason.Based on Schefter’s report and the team’s official update, Hunter’s recovery window puts him on track to resume full football activities by mid-May 2026. This means he should be ready in time for Jacksonville’s training camp next summer.Fortunately, doctors confirmed there was no structural damage beyond the LCL, which significantly boosts his chances for a complete recovery.Before the injury, Hunter was showcasing exactly why he was one of the most hyped prospects entering the league. In just seven games, the 22-year-old proved his versatility—catching 28 passes for 298 yards and a touchdown on offense while making 15 tackles and breaking up three passes on defense. His ability to perform as both a receiver and cornerback made him an invaluable part of the Jaguars’ system.The Jaguars currently sit at 5–4, clinging to the AFC’s final Wild Card spot. However, losing a player of Hunter’s caliber could impact their playoff push significantly. Still, the long-term outlook remains optimistic. If recovery stays on course, Hunter’s full return next season could mark the start of an even more dominant era for Jacksonville’s rising star.
Article Summary: Jaguars rookie travis hunter ruled out for season. Hunter suffered a knee injury during practice in late october. Doctors confirmed there was no structural damage beyond the lcl. He’s expected to return to full football activities within six months.

Article Title: Are Ice Spice and Sauce Gardner still dating? Inside the rapper’s candid confession and the NFL star’s low-key response
Article Text:
Fans are questioning if Ice Spice and Sauce Gardner are still dating after months of public sightings and cryptic social media posts. The rapper and NFL cornerback confirmed they previously dated, describing their connection as fun and cute, and remain friends. Their mutual admiration continues to fuel speculation about their relationship status.

From viral moments to public outings, their rumored romance keeps fans guessing

More coverage on NFL:

Are Ice Spice and Sauce Gardner still dating? That’s the question fans can’t stop asking after months of flirty sightings, deleted Instagram posts, and cryptic interviews that fueled one of pop culture’s most unexpected romances. The “Deli” rapper and Indianapolis Colts cornerback first caught attention back in February 2025 when a viral TikTok video showed them together, instantly setting the internet ablaze with speculation.Since then, the pair has been seen at high-profile events, basketball games, and award parties, but neither has been eager to put a label on things. What’s clear, however, is that Ice Spice and Gardner’s connection has gone beyond just rumor.Their story started quietly, with Gardner revealing they met in April 2024 during a taping of The Shop, alongside LeBron James and Travis Scott. The chemistry soon became public when fans spotted them together at the Vanity Fair Oscars Party and sitting courtside at a Celtics-Knicks game. Even as both downplayed the chatter, Gardner admitted to TMZ, “We cool… We just be having a good time, you know, like two young individuals.The pair’s subtle online exchanges only deepened fan intrigue. Both Ice and Gardner posted, and later deleted photos together, including one of them by a Rolls-Royce and another cozy mirror selfie. When asked about her connection with the NFL player, Ice Spice later confirmed on Baby, This Is Keke Palmer that they had indeed dated, saying, “Yeah, I did confirm that on my Instagram… it was fun. It was cute. We’re still friends. We were just dating.”Gardner, for his part, praised her artistry and confidence. “She’s talented, real talented when it come to what she do,” he told TMZ. “Two people that get hated on that’s really good at what we do. So you know we got a lot in common.”While both stars seem focused on their careers, Ice on her music and Gardner on the Colts’ season, their mutual admiration remains undeniable, keeping fans wondering whether their spark is truly over or just on pause.Whether or not Ice Spice and Sauce Gardner reignite their romance, their mutual respect and easy chemistry have already made them one of pop culture’s most intriguing duos—proof that fame and authenticity can still coexist in today’s spotlight.
Article Summary: Fans are questioning if ice spice and sauce gardner are still dating after months of public sightings and cryptic social media posts. The rapper and nfl cornerback confirmed they previously dated, describing their connection as fun and cute, and remain friends. Their mutual admiration continues to fuel speculation about their relationship status.

Article Title: Chris Eubank Jr’s twin baby announcement with mystery girlfriend steals spotlight before Conor Benn rematch
Article Text:
Chris Eubank Jr’s twin baby announcement with mystery girlfriend steals spotlight before Conor Benn rematch (Image via Getty)

Chris Eubank Jr says he wants to be the kind of father he never had

Chris Eubank Jr has shared big personal news just days before his heated rematch with Conor Benn. The 36-year-old boxer announced that he and his long-term girlfriend are expecting twin boys, surprising fans right before stepping into the ring again. Eubank Jr, who beat Benn earlier this year at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium after 12 rounds with a 116-112 decision, shared the happy update on social media. He posted a short clip from his BBC reality show The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son, showing the moment he told his dad, Chris Eubank Sr, the news.“So yes, many of you guessed it. I will soon be joining the dad gang. Only difference is I’ll be joining as a father of two! Twin boys!! I’m so grateful for such a blessing and I’ll do my best to give them the happiest upbringing I can, just like my old man did for me,” he wrote on X. The post instantly went viral, as fans congratulated him for what he called “the biggest blessing of my life.”In the BBC clip, Chris Eubank Jr is seen sharing the news with his father. “You’ve got two grandsons on the way,” he tells Eubank Sr. “I never thought about being a father my whole life, but now I want to be one who my kids can talk to about anything. I couldn’t do that with my old man.”Chris Eubank Sr couldn’t hold back his joy. He pumped his fists in the air and shouted “Rastafari reach!” in celebration.The two have had a tense relationship for years. Their falling out started in 2019 when Chris Eubank Jr wrote to his father saying he was stepping away from his training role. Things worsened before their first fight with Benn, as Eubank Sr publicly called the match “attempted murder” because of the extreme weight cut his son had to make.Also Read: Jannik Sinner And Laila Hasanovic Combined Net Worth In 2025: Tennis Star And Model Girlfriend Earnings, Ventures, Career And More But now, both father and son seem to be rebuilding their bond. Chris Eubank Jr told Daily Mail Sport that it hasn’t been easy but they’re “working to get back” to how things used to be. “It’s not overnight, but he’ll be at my next fight. That means a lot to me,” he said.
Article Summary: Chris eubank jr announced he and his girlfriend are expecting twin boys. The 36-year-old boxer beat conor benn in their first fight earlier this year. He posted a short clip from his bbc reality show the eubanks: like father, like son, showing the moment he told his dad.

Article Title: Is Nikola Jokic playing tonight vs the Sacramento Kings? Latest update on the Denver Nuggets star’s injury report (November 11, 2025)
Article Text:
Nikola Jokic of Nuggets vs Warriors (Image via AP Photo)

Denver Nuggets have confirmed that Nikola Jokic will play tonight

Nikola Jokic’s Injury Status vs Sacramento Kings (November 11, 2025)

Denver Nuggets’ Injury Report vs Sacramento Kings (November 11, 2025)

Sacramento Kings Facing Injury Concerns

A Crucial Western Conference Clash

Theagainst the Sacramento Kings, ending speculation about his availability. The star center, who was listed as probable heading into the matchup, is not facing any significant injury concerns and is set to lead Denver’s frontcourt once again. His presence provides a massive boost for the Nuggets as they look to extend their strong start to the 2025-26 NBA season.Jokic’s return solidifies Denver’s lineup for a critical Western Conference matchup. The Nuggets have been one of the league’s most consistent teams early this season, currently holding a 7-2 record and riding a four-game winning streak. With the team nearing full strength, fans can expect another night of dominant basketball from the reigning NBA champions.As of November 11, 2025, Nikola Jokic is officially healthy enough to take the floor, despite minor ankle discomfort that has lingered since the season began. The two-time MVP continues to perform at an elite level, anchoring Denver’s offense with his trademark playmaking and efficiency.In his last outing, Jokic recorded a remarkable triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 14 assists in a decisive win over the Indiana Pacers.His ability to control the tempo and elevate his teammates remains unmatched, reinforcing his reputation as one of the most complete players in basketball. Denver’s offensive rhythm continues to revolve around Nikola Jokic’s versatility and leadership on the court.The Denver Nuggets’ roster appears close to full health, with both Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon also listed as probable for tonight’s contest. Murray has been nursing a mild calf strain, while Gordon has been recovering from a hamstring issue. Both players sat out the previous game but have made positive strides in recovery and are expected to return to action.Head coach Michael Malone expressed optimism about having his core lineup intact, emphasizing the importance of continuity as the team navigates a competitive Western Conference schedule. The return of Murray and Gordon provides Denver with added depth and balance, complementing Jokic’s dominance in the paint.On the other side, the Sacramento Kings enter tonight’s matchup struggling to find consistency, holding a 3-7 record so far. Their challenge intensifies as star center Domantas Sabonis remains questionable with a rib contusion. If Sabonis is limited or unavailable, it could tilt the frontcourt battle heavily in Denver’s favor.Nikola Jokic has historically outperformed Sabonis in their head-to-head meetings, and with Sacramento’s depth tested by early-season injuries, Denver’s chances of securing another win look promising.Also read: Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight vs the Phialdelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star’s injury report (November 11, 2025) Tonight’s showdown between the Denver Nuggets and Kings promises excitement, intensity, and strategic basketball. With Nikola Jokic leading the charge and Denver approaching full strength, fans can expect another display of dominance from the Serbian superstar. His performance will likely be central to the Nuggets’ pursuit of a fifth consecutive victory and continued momentum on the road.
Article Summary: Denver nuggets have confirmed that nikola jokic will play tonight against the sacramento kings. The star center, who was listed as probable heading into the matchup, is not facing any significant injury concerns. His presence provides a massive boost for the nuggets as they look to extend their strong start to the 2025-26 nba season.

Article Title: "We’re good at...": Oilers’ Connor McDavid discusses team’s mindset after comeback overtime win vs Blue Jackets
Article Text:
Connor McDavid opens up after Oilers’ late comeback and overtime victory over Blue Jackets (Getty Images)

Connor McDavid fuels Oilers’ comeback with unstoppable drive





More NHL coverage

The Edmonton Oilers needed something special on Monday night, and Connor McDavid delivered exactly that. With the team down late in the third period, McDavid’s sheer will and brilliance lifted Edmonton to a stunning 5-4 overtime win over the Columbus Blue Jackets at Rogers Place. It wasn’t just another comeback. It was the kind of performance that reminded everyone why McDavid is considered one of the best in the game -- a player who refuses to let his team go quietly.The Oilers, coming off a humbling 9-1 defeat to Colorado, entered this game under pressure to prove themselves. The fans were restless, and McDavid made sure their frustration didn’t go unanswered. “We hear it,” McDavid said. “We understand what happened on Saturday was not what we want to display to our fans. We’re all trying to win games, and we did that tonight.”Down 4-2 in the third period, McDavid took control. Less than a minute into the frame, he danced past Denton Mateychuk, cut across the crease, and lifted a backhand past Jet Greaves. Later, he struck again, slicing the deficit to one and reigniting belief on the bench and in the stands. His pair of goals sparked the Oilers’ rally, keeping his personal scoring streak alive at five games, with four goals and six assists in that span.“The group likes to put itself in a tough spot and just when you think it’s a tough spot, we go a little bit further,” McDavid admitted, according to NHL.com. “Then we decide it’s time to go. We stuck with it. We put ourselves in a tough spot, but we’re good at coming from behind.”With just 58 seconds left in regulation, Jake Walman’s shot deflected off Zach Werenski to tie the game, and Jack Roslovic sealed the win 56 seconds into overtime.“Connor wasn’t going to let us lose tonight, he was so focused on getting the job done,” coach Kris Knoblauch said. “He had an incredible night, two fabulous goals, but there was just so much determination to his game.”McDavid’s rallying cry of “enough is enough” after the Avalanche loss now rings louder than ever. On Monday, he didn’t just say it -- he proved it.
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers beat columbus blue jackets 5-4 in overtime on monday night. Connor mcdavid scored twice in the third period to spark the comeback. The oilers were coming off a humbling 9-1 defeat to colorado on saturday. Mcdavid has now scored five goals in his last five games.

Article Title: “There are no answers”: Jerry Jones issues statement on death of Marshawn Kneeland
Article Text:
(Getty Images)

“It was in the middle of the night when we all got the news,”

“As a teammate, he touched everybody in many different ways.”

Jerry Jones says he’s “devastated” and still in disbelief over Kneeland’s sudden death

“He was only 24 years old… he was just getting started,”

“It’s something none of us expected,”

“We just hurt right now.”

“It’s just a time when you acknowledge there are no answers,”

“It makes you want to live life to the fullest.”

“There’s no doubt in my mind they will move forward in memory of what he was all about,”

“When something like this happens, you realize how much you mean to each other,”

“We’ll carry Marshawn’s spirit with us every step of the way.”

More coverage on Marshawn Kneeland:



The Dallas Cowboys are reeling after the sudden death of rookie defensive lineman Marshawn Kneeland and now, team owner Jerry Jones has spoken publicly for the first time. In a series of emotional remarks, Jones described the 24-year-old’s passing as “devastating” and “hard to believe. ” For a man who’s seen just about everything in football, his voice carried the weight of someone who had truly been shaken.Speaking on his radio show earlier this week, Jerry Jones didn’t hold back his emotions while addressing Marshawn Kneeland’s death.Jones said, pausing before adding,The 24-year-old Kneeland had only begun his professional career, and Jones made sure to highlight just how much promise he had.he said, reflecting on the defensive end’s energy and potential both on and off the field.The Cowboys owner noted that the timing of the tragedy coming during the team’s bye week made it all the more surreal.he said.Jones’s comments took a more reflective tone as he talked about how Kneeland’s passing put life into perspective.he said.Those words echoed deeply across the Cowboys community, as players and staff tried to process the loss of someone they described as hardworking, humble, and always smiling. Jones’s candor showed a side of him fans don’t often see, the human side behind the franchise.In the midst of the heartbreak, Jones also shared that the team intends to honor Kneeland in every way possible.he said. While details haven’t been finalized, the Cowboys are expected to hold a tribute before their next game and possibly dedicate part of their season to his memory.Jones emphasized that the tragedy has bonded the team even closer.he said.Jerry Jones’s words captured what the entire Cowboys organization is feeling: heartbreak, disbelief, and gratitude for having known Marshawn Kneeland, even for a short time.As the Cowboys prepare to return to play, the focus won’t just be on football. It will be on honoring a life that left a mark much deeper than the stat sheet.
Article Summary: The dallas cowboys are reeling after the sudden death of rookie defensive lineman marshawn kneeland. In a series of emotional remarks, team owner jerry jones described the 24-year-old’s passing as “devastating” and “hard to believe.”

Article Title: IND vs SA: From Shubman Gill to Jasprit Bumrah - who did what during first Kolkata practice session?
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah with head coach Gautam Gambhir during a training session ahead of the first Test match between India and South Africa, at Eden Gardens, in Kolkata. The match is scheduled to be held from November 14 to 18, 2025. (PTI)

Jasprit Bumrah vs Injury: Untold story of why Indian cricketers fear getting hurt

South Africa prepare with focus on spin



Ahead of the vital two-match Test series against South Africa, the Indian men's cricket team began their practice session on Tuesday at Kolkata's Eden Gardens, where the first match of the series will be played from November 14 to 18.Shubman Gill, Jasprit Bumrah, Sai Sudharsan, Ravindra Jadeja, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Washington Sundar and Nitish Kumar Reddy took part in the optional session.Shubman Gill spent nearly 90 minutes in the nets as he adjusted back to red-ball cricket after recent white-ball games. Before batting, head coach Gautam Gambhir and assistant coach Sitanshu Kotak spoke with him near the High Court end, news agency PTI reported. Gill then joined slip-catching drills and later batted in the nets with Yashasvi Jaiswal.Gill first batted against spin, facing Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar and played shots on the ground with sweeps at times. He then moved to pace bowling, facing Nitish Kumar Reddy and a few local bowlers. A support staff member used a sidearm for throwdowns from a higher release point to give more bounce and pace. After that, Gill shifted to the central pitch for about 30 minutes of throwdowns with bowling coach Morne Morkel also bowling to him.Yashasvi Jaiswal, coming off scores of 67 and 156 for Mumbai in the Ranji Trophy match against Rajasthan, also had a long session on the central wicket, where he faced Morkel and throwdowns and played drives and pulls.Sai Sudharsan also batted for a long period. He scored 84 runs in two unofficial Tests for India A against South Africa A. The team management continues to try him at No. 3. In Tests, though, he is yet to make it his own, with only a 61 against England in Manchester and 87 versus West Indies at home to show so far in Tests.Among the fast bowlers, only Jasprit Bumrah bowled. He kept his workload light, bowling at two stumps for around 15 minutes and targeting the off stump.South Africa also trained on Tuesday after arriving from their hard-earned 1-1 draw against Pakistan in Rawalpindi.With captain Temba Bavuma fit and back to lead the side for the first time since the World Test Championship final win in June, South Africa held a training session with the full squad. The visiting team worked on playing spin and spent the session on plans to counter the Indian spinners.
Article Summary: Shubman gill, jasprit bumrah, sai sudharsan, ravindra jadeja, yashasvi jaiswal, washington sundar and nitish kumar reddy take part in optional session. South africa also trained on tuesday after arriving from their hard-earned 1-1 draw against pakistan in rawalpindi. The visiting team worked on plans to counter the indian spinners.

Article Title: "I'm not a bad guy": Micheal Ray Richardson’s heartbreaking words about his addiction to drugs resurface after his tragic death
Article Text:
Michael Ray Richardson was banned from the NBA in 1986.(Image via NBA)

Micheal Ray Richardson opened up about using drugs in his memoir



Micheal Ray Richardson on overcoming a lifetime ban from the NBA (Hear District - Episode 26)

More coverage on the NBA -

Micheal Ray Richardson, the NBA legend suffered an unfortunate death which has left his fans mourning and shocked. While Micheal Ray Richardson had a short career in the NBA, fans are still in awe of his skills.Back in 1986, Micheal Ray Richardson was banned from the NBA for life after he ended up testing positive for cocaine for the third time in three seasons. While the NBA legend did get a chance to rejoin the league in 1988, he never returned.A year ago, he co-authored a memoir about his life called, "Banned: How I squandered an All-Star NBA Career Before Finding a Redemption”, where he opened up about his addiction to drugs.In his memoir, Micheal Ray Richardson had opened up about meeting a man named Muhammad who had gotten him addicted to drugs.As per his memoir, Micheal Ray Richardson wrote, “Even though I got into some rough spots, I'm not a bad guy. You get blinders when you're an addict. You're there, looking through your eyes... but at the same time, you're not all there. Because of that, when I would get high, I wouldn't want to go out in public.”The 70 year old NBA legend also reiterated that he never sold drugs or drove his car while he was “smoking” it.A year back, Micheal Ray Richardson also spoke to The Guardian about drugs being used in the league today.He said, “Even now…it’s not like it was back in the 80s when I was [playing]. Because now there’s the fentanyl. Now what they’re doing is mixing all the drugs with fentanyl and it only takes a little – because fentanyl will kill you.”The NBA legend added, “One thing about alcohol and drugs…they do not discriminate.”After leaving the NBA in 1986 and refusing to return, Micheal Ray Richardson played in the Continental Basketball Association but finished his career in Europe.Later in his life, the NBA legend won five championships as a coach in the Continental Basketball Association and NBL Canada.According to The Associated Press, Micheal Ray Richardson died in his home in Lawton, Oklahoma in the presence of his wife, Kimberly.
Article Summary: Micheal ray richardson was banned from the nba for life in 1986 after testing positive for cocaine for the third time in three seasons. The nba legend never returned to the league and spent the rest of his career in europe. In his memoir, he opened up about meeting a man named muhammad who got him addicted to drugs.

Article Title: Shane Bieber's wife Kara melts hearts with emotional post on his comeback and their baby's sweet moment during Toronto Blue Jays World Series run
Article Text:
Shane Bieber with his wife Kara Maxine (Image via: Getty)

Kara’s viral photo with their baby captures the love behind Shane Bieber’s comeback

(Image via: Kara Maxine's IG Story)

Toronto Blue Jays ace Shane Bieber’s comeback in 2024 has been nothing short of extraordinary, a story of pain, patience, and perseverance that inspired baseball fans far beyond Toronto. After a year-long battle to return from Tommy John surgery, Bieber didn’t just step back on the mound, he stormed through one of the most intense postseason runs of his career, leading the Jays to a thrilling World Series appearance. But as much as his performance wowed fans, it was his wife Kara Maxine’s heartfelt Instagram post, featuring a sweet photo of their baby, that truly melted hearts and reminded everyone of the family behind his journey.In a recent Instagram Q&A, Kara spoke candidly about Bieber’s resilience and how emotional it was to see him rise again after such a demanding recovery. The right-hander had undergone surgery while still with the Cleveland Guardians, before being traded to Toronto in exchange for Khal Stephen. Adapting to a new team and city while navigating rehab was no small task, but Kara revealed how her husband’s determination never wavered.“He’s accomplished a lot in his career,” Kara said. “But coming back from TJ and giving everything he had to a new team through the most intense playoff run and World Series, his grit, work ethic, and mental toughness are unmatched.”Along with her heartfelt words, Kara shared a touching Instagram Story that quickly went viral, a candid shot of her in the stands, smiling with their baby dressed in a ‘Bieber’ jersey and wearing tiny ear protectors. “He is such a little trooper. So proud of him,” she wrote, before adding with a laugh, “But don’t get me wrong, he will also act like a baby would on a 5-hour flight in the middle of the night lol.” The lighthearted caption struck a chord with fans who’ve followed the couple’s journey through every high and low of the season.For Shane Bieber, the 2024 season wasn’t just a professional triumph, it was a deeply personal one. His comeback became a story of belief and balance, where family and perseverance carried him through. And for Kara Maxine, it was a moment to celebrate not just a husband’s success, but the love and strength that made it possible.Also read: Fans can’t stop talking about Shohei Ohtani’s heartfelt Dodger Stadium moment with his dog
Article Summary: Toronto blue jays ace shane bieber's comeback in 2024 has been nothing short of extraordinary. After a year-long battle to return from tommy john surgery, bieber didn’t just step back on the mound, he stormed through one of the most intense postseason runs of his career.
